title: Where it Started
description: Features advertisements from the early tv days.

videos.title: Bulova 1st TV ad
videos.description: The Bulova commercial was the world's first legal television ad and cost the Bulova Watch Company a whopping $9.00 USD. NBC affiliate WNBT aired the 10-second spot before a baseball game between the Brooklyn Dodgers and Philadelphia Phillies in July of 1941. [0:10]
